intro: Meliosma forrestii, commonly known as the Chinese meliosma, is a species of flowering plant in the family Meliaceae. It is native to China and is characterized by its small, simple leaves and yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, often in forests or along streambanks. Its botanical features include a slender stem and small, inconspicuous fruits. Meliosma forrestii is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and ecological adaptations.
